General.Name: Fittech Co Ltd
General.Description: Fittech Co.,Ltd provides automatic equipment and system integration services in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers LED probing and testing equipment, including LED chip and wafer probing and testing systems; auto LED wafer, auto flip-chip, and auto LED chip probing and testing systems; auto production LED mapping sorters; high accuracy automatic chip counters; and automatic detaching tape systems. It also provides LD probing and testing equipment, such as laser diode probing and testing solutions; edge emitting laser probing and sorting systems; VCSEL, PD, and VCSEL near and far field pattern probing and testing systems; and COC-COS testing and sorting systems. In addition, the company offers laser micromachining and cleaning solutions, as well as OEM services. It serves photonics and optics, electronics, semiconductor, automotive, and manufacturing industries. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 3, Taichung Industrial Park, Taichung, Taiwan, 407
